My Projects

My Projects

A collection of open source projects spanning blockchain infrastructure, onchain payments, and developer tools.

x402 Payment Examples

Comprehensive examples and tests for x402 onchain payment standard, including both direct and forwarding implementations.

https://github.com/TheGreatAxios/x402-examples

EIP-3009 Forwarder

Production-ready EIP-3009 forwarder contracts with comprehensive tests, designed to accelerate x402 adoption on EVM chains.

https://github.com/TheGreatAxios/eip3009-forwarder

SKALE CLI

Developer tools and CLI utilities for streamlined SKALE network interactions and deployment workflows.

https://github.com/TheGreatAxios/skale-cli

SKL Supply Dashboard

Interactive dashboard providing real-time insights into SKL token economics, supply metrics, and network statistics.

https://github.com/TheGreatAxios/skl-supply-ui
https://skl-supply-ui.pages.dev

SKALE Documentation

Comprehensive documentation platform for the SKALE network, developer guides, and ecosystem resources.

https://github.com/skalenetwork/docs.skale.space
https://docs.skale.space

SKALE RNG Service

Verifiable random number generation service built for the SKALE ecosystem with cryptographic security guarantees.

https://github.com/Dirt-Road-Development/skale-rng

Gasless Transactions (Rust)

Rust implementation of gasless transaction infrastructure, enabling seamless user experiences without gas fees.

https://github.com/Dirt-Road-Development/gasless-rs

SKALE Oracle SDK

Official SDK for integrating with SKALE's decentralized oracle network, enabling real-world data integration.

https://github.com/skalenetwork/oracle-sdk

sFUEL Station

Smart contracts for SFUEL distribution and management within the SKALE ecosystem.

https://github.com/Dirt-Road-Development/sfuel-station
https://sfuelstation.com

sFUEL Distribution System

Automated distribution contracts for SKALE's SFUEL token with fair allocation mechanisms.

https://github.com/Dirt-Road-Development/sfuel-distribution-contract

Monorail Bridge Contracts

Infrastructure contracts for the Monorail cross-chain bridge system on SKALE.

https://github.com/Dirt-Road-Development/monorail-contracts

FAIR L1 Blockchain Documentation

Technical documentation and guides for the Fairchain ecosystem and its underlying infrastructure.

https://github.com/thegreataxios/docs.fairchain.ai
http://docs-fairchain-ai.pages.dev/

All projects are open source and available on GitHub. Contributions welcome.
